message:
Bhai ami sylhet teke bolchi,
gotokal amar ek mama us teke esecen, sahjalal airport teke recv korte sylhet teke nuha gari rigerv kore giyecilam, ashar pote police norshingdi te amader garir kagoj reke de ebong driver k agamikal sokal (today) 8 tar modde norshingdi te present hoar jonno bole, ebave onek gari atkiye garir kagoj reke dicche, uddesso ektai 5 may oborud er jonno gari atkano

(fan post)
